sentences.en: 'Willingly , and a small return for your good offices.'
sentences.cn: “ 欢迎, 也可以对你的帮助聊表谢意. ”

sentences.en: 'Willingly, sir,'said Monsieur Defarge, and quietly stepped with him to the door.
sentences.cn: “ 说吧, 先生, ”德伐日先生说, 平静地跟他走到门边.

sentences.en: A bellyful of gluttony will never study willingly.
A mangled painful limb, which cannot be restored, we willingly cut off.
sentences.cn: 一只受了伤,疼痛而又无法复原的手或脚, 我们心甘情愿地把它割掉.

sentences.en: He was not willingly a prevaricator, and hated thoroughly to make explanations concerning it.
sentences.cn: 他并不是个喜欢支吾其辞的人, 而又讨厌就这事作任何解释.

sentences.en: He would willingly have been a martyr in the cause, had the cause admitted of martyrdom.
sentences.cn: 如果这一事业允许殉难的话,他会欣然为这一事业献生的.

sentences.en: In principle we willingly admit the Russians'right to a share in the Italian Fleet.
sentences.cn: 在原则上,我们愿意承认俄国有权分得意大利舰队的一部分舰只.

sentences.en: Many people willingly converted to Buddhism.
Most companies willingly correct what went wrong or, if that is impossible, explain why the situation occurred.
sentences.cn: 大多数公司愿意主动改正错误，如果无法改正，也会解释为什么会出现这种情况。

sentences.en: She would willingly forgo a birthday treat if only her warring parents would declare a truce.
sentences.cn: 只要她的父母停止争吵,她愿意放弃生日宴请.

sentences.en: There are times when we would willingly give everything we possess to save our lives, yet we might grudge paying a surgeon a high fee for offering us precisely this service.
sentences.cn: 有时候我们心甘情愿地付出自己的一切财物以保全自己的生命, 但是外科医生正是为我们提供这种服务,我们却不肯多给他些医疗费.

sentences.en: To keep his job, he willingly subordinated his own interests to the objectives of the company.
sentences.cn: 为了保住工作, 他自愿使自己的利益服从公司的目标.

sentences.en: When her mother suggested that she stay, Alice willingly acquiesced.
sentences.cn: 当母亲建议她留下时，艾丽斯欣然允之。
